info.brief_description: High School girls want their classmates to smell their gas
info.description:
No death, vore, or scat.
The story revolves around the girls listed below, they go to West Potomac High School and they want to fart on each other. Try to keep them farting on each other and not on random people. Shrinking is allowed, but don't put it as the only option and try not to overuse it.

Wingel: She is Filipino and 18 years old. She is short, with long hair down to the middle of her back, which the bottom half of her hair is dyed blonde while the top half is a natural black color. She mostly wears leggings, but she does occasionally wear really short shorts.
Cemyira: She is black and 18 years old. She is just slightly chubby, but shes has a huge ass that if anyone gets trapped under, it would be a nightmare to try to get her off while she's farting. She wears leggings a lot, just like Wingel.
Katy: She is white and 18 years old. She's a bit chubby, but that just means its hard to escape her ass. She has a big butt that's usually in jeans.
Mackenzie: She is white and 18 years old. Her stomach pokes out only slightly, but that's not what you have to worry about. She has a big butt and she loves to wear sweat pants.
Harley: She is white and 18 years old. She has an average butt, but it always sticks out in the leggings or shorts she's usually wearing.
Grace: She is Chinese and 18 years old. She has a small butt and is really short and weak.. (Note: She is the punching bag of this story, so you can have everyone fart on her, or she can fart on people as well.)
